alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Twin Falls and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crawfish Crossing, or 18 miles northeast of Jarbidge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Salls Crossing around 400 PM MDT. Black Butte around 410 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
